Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Citadines Castellane Marseille places you in the heart of Marseille, walking distance from 26th Centenary Park and Place Castellane. This residence is within close proximity of International Fair and Exhibition Center Marseille and University of Aix-Marseille II.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 97 guestrooms, featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. Complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and coffee/tea makers, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (complimentary).

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access.

Dining
Continental breakfasts are available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and multilingual staff. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Continental breakfasts are available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Take in the views from a terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access.
Make yourself at home in one of the 97 guestrooms, featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. Complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and coffee/tea makers, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (complimentary).

A stay at Citadines Castellane Marseille places you in the heart of Marseille, walking distance from 26th Centenary Park and Place Castellane. This residence is within close proximity of International Fair and Exhibition Center Marseille and University of Aix-Marseille II.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

26th Centenary Park - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Place Castellane - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
International Fair and Exhibition Center Marseille - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
University of Aix-Marseille II - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Parc Chanot Convention and Exhibition Center - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Faculty of Medicine - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Timone Hospital - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Notre-Dame de la Garde - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi
La Plaine - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi
Marseille Opera House - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Velodrome Stadium - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Musee de la Marine - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Marseille Tourism Office - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Vieux Port - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Saint Vincent de Paul Church - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi

The nearest airports are:
Aix-en-Provence (QXB-Aix en Provence TGV Train Station) - 20 km / 12.4 mi
Marseille (MRS-Marseille - Provence) - 22.2 km / 13.8 mi

The preferred airport for Citadines Castellane Marseille is Marseille (MRS-Marseille - Provence).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
